title: Add context configuration to .ticker/config.json
description:
Add configuration options for context generation.

## Config Schema
```json
{
  "context": {
    "enabled": true,
    "max_tokens": 4000,
    "auto_refresh_days": 7,
    "generation_timeout": "5m",
    "generation_model": "sonnet"
  }
}
```

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Config struct extended with ContextConfig
- [ ] Default values applied if section missing
- [ ] enabled=false skips all context generation
- [ ] max_tokens passed to prompt builder
- [ ] generation_timeout parsed as duration
- [ ] generation_model selects agent model
- [ ] Config validated on load (sensible ranges)

## Options
| Option | Default | Description |
|--------|---------|-------------|
| enabled | true | Enable context generation |
| max_tokens | 4000 | Target context doc size |
| auto_refresh_days | 0 | Days until auto-refresh (0=never) |
| generation_timeout | 5m | Max generation time |
| generation_model | "" | Model override for generation |
